channel.title: wine on Einar Holsbø
channel.description: Recent content in wine on Einar Holsbø

item.title: Neural network overengineering
item.description: In my idle hours (ie when I should have been writing a paper), I came across this blog post where the author trained a neural netwok in the fine art of wine tasting. I am basically deep down a very lazy person, and from what little I understand of NNs, there are quite a few knobs to fiddle with, which really who has the time with all this untasted wine floating about?
